issue.title: [R] Fix missing file error causing NYC taxi example to fail
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10470](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10470). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the NYC taxi data example in the [Working with Arrow Datasets and dplyr](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/dataset.html) vignette, the code to download Parquet files from an S3 bucket fails because one of the files is missing. The missing file is `s3://ursa-labs-taxi-data/2010/03/data.parquet`. Please restore this missing file or modify the code to continue running despite the missing file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10470?focusedCommentId=17260865) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9132
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9132>
